Community
=========

Mailing List
++++++++++++

General discussion, questions, and application showing off should go to:

`rhubarbtart-discuss@groups.google.com <http://groups.google.com/group/rhubarbtart-discuss>`_:
`Subscribe <http://groups.google.com/group/rhubarbtart-discuss/subscribe>`__,
`Archives <http://groups.google.com/group/rhubarbtart-discuss>`__

IRC
+++

For live IRC discussion, try #pythonpaste on `irc.freenode.net
<irc://irc.freenode.net/#pythonpaste>`_
